description: Schools in Ireland have been closed since 12 March due to the coronavirus pandemic.
title: Coronavirus: Return to school for many pupils in the Republic of Ireland
title_page: Coronavirus: Return to school for many pupils in the Republic of Ireland - BBC News
maintext: "We are living in a new normal. However, we have put in place all the precautions necessary and along with the dedication of the principals and teachers at a local school level, you can be assured that your child will return to a safe and welcoming classroom."
